00070 const int32_t CSeqNo::m_iSeqNoTH = 0x3FFFFFFF;
00071 const int32_t CSeqNo::m_iMaxSeqNo = 0x7FFFFFFF;
00072 const int32_t CAckNo::m_iMaxAckSeqNo = 0x7FFFFFFF;

00081 CUDT::CUDT()
00082 {
00083    m_pSndBuffer = NULL;
00084    m_pRcvBuffer = NULL;
00085    m_pSndLossList = NULL;
00086    m_pRcvLossList = NULL;
00087    m_pACKWindow = NULL;
00088    m_pSndTimeWindow = NULL;
00089    m_pRcvTimeWindow = NULL;
00090 
00091    m_pSndQueue = NULL;
00092    m_pRcvQueue = NULL;
00093    m_pPeerAddr = NULL;
00094    m_pSNode = NULL;
00095    m_pRNode = NULL;
00096 
00097    // Initilize mutex and condition variables
00098    initSynch();
00099 
00100    // Default UDT configurations
00101    m_iMSS = 1500;
00102    m_bSynSending = true;
00103    m_bSynRecving = true;
00104    m_iFlightFlagSize = 25600;
00105    m_iSndBufSize = 8192;
00106    m_iRcvBufSize = 8192; //Rcv buffer MUST NOT be bigger than Flight Flag size
00107    m_Linger.l_onoff = 1;
00108    m_Linger.l_linger = 180;
00109    m_iUDPSndBufSize = 65536;
00110    m_iUDPRcvBufSize = m_iRcvBufSize * m_iMSS;
00111    m_iSockType = UDT_STREAM;
00112    m_iIPversion = AF_INET;
00113    m_bRendezvous = false;
00114    m_iSndTimeOut = -1;
00115    m_iRcvTimeOut = -1;
00116    m_bReuseAddr = true;
00117    m_llMaxBW = -1;
00118 
00119    m_pCCFactory = new CCCFactory<CUDTCC>;
00120    m_pCC = NULL;
00121    m_pCache = NULL;
00122 
00123    // Initial status
00124    m_bOpened = false;
00125    m_bListening = false;
00126    m_bConnected = false;
00127    m_bClosing = false;
00128    m_bShutdown = false;
00129    m_bBroken = false;
00130    m_bPeerHealth = true;
00131    m_ullLingerExpiration = 0;
00132 }

00134 CUDT::CUDT(const CUDT& ancestor)
00135 {
00136    m_pSndBuffer = NULL;
00137    m_pRcvBuffer = NULL;
00138    m_pSndLossList = NULL;
00139    m_pRcvLossList = NULL;
00140    m_pACKWindow = NULL;
00141    m_pSndTimeWindow = NULL;
00142    m_pRcvTimeWindow = NULL;
00143 
00144    m_pSndQueue = NULL;
00145    m_pRcvQueue = NULL;
00146    m_pPeerAddr = NULL;
00147    m_pSNode = NULL;
00148    m_pRNode = NULL;
00149 
00150    // Initilize mutex and condition variables
00151    initSynch();
00152 
00153    // Default UDT configurations
00154    m_iMSS = ancestor.m_iMSS;
00155    m_bSynSending = ancestor.m_bSynSending;
00156    m_bSynRecving = ancestor.m_bSynRecving;
00157    m_iFlightFlagSize = ancestor.m_iFlightFlagSize;
00158    m_iSndBufSize = ancestor.m_iSndBufSize;
00159    m_iRcvBufSize = ancestor.m_iRcvBufSize;
00160    m_Linger = ancestor.m_Linger;
00161    m_iUDPSndBufSize = ancestor.m_iUDPSndBufSize;
00162    m_iUDPRcvBufSize = ancestor.m_iUDPRcvBufSize;
00163    m_iSockType = ancestor.m_iSockType;
00164    m_iIPversion = ancestor.m_iIPversion;
00165    m_bRendezvous = ancestor.m_bRendezvous;
00166    m_iSndTimeOut = ancestor.m_iSndTimeOut;
00167    m_iRcvTimeOut = ancestor.m_iRcvTimeOut;
00168    m_bReuseAddr = true; // this must be true, because all accepted sockets shared the same port with the listener
00169    m_llMaxBW = ancestor.m_llMaxBW;
00170 
00171    m_pCCFactory = ancestor.m_pCCFactory->clone();
00172    m_pCC = NULL;
00173    m_pCache = ancestor.m_pCache;
00174 
00175    // Initial status
00176    m_bOpened = false;
00177    m_bListening = false;
00178    m_bConnected = false;
00179    m_bClosing = false;
00180    m_bShutdown = false;
00181    m_bBroken = false;
00182    m_bPeerHealth = true;
00183    m_ullLingerExpiration = 0;
00184 }

00186 CUDT::~CUDT()
00187 {
00188    // release mutex/condtion variables
00189    destroySynch();
00190 
00191    // destroy the data structures
00192    delete m_pSndBuffer;
00193    delete m_pRcvBuffer;
00194    delete m_pSndLossList;
00195    delete m_pRcvLossList;
00196    delete m_pACKWindow;
00197    delete m_pSndTimeWindow;
00198    delete m_pRcvTimeWindow;
00199    delete m_pCCFactory;
00200    delete m_pCC;
00201    delete m_pPeerAddr;
00202    delete m_pSNode;
00203    delete m_pRNode;
00204 }

00206 void CUDT::setOpt(UDTOpt optName, const void* optval, const int&)
00207 {
00208    if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
00209       throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
00210 
00211    CGuard cg(m_ConnectionLock);
00212    CGuard sendguard(m_SendLock);
00213    CGuard recvguard(m_RecvLock);
00214 
00215    switch (optName)
00216    {
00217    case UDT_MSS:
00218       if (m_bOpened)
00219          throw CUDTException(5, 1, 0);
00220 
00221       if (*(int*)optval < int(28 + CHandShake::m_iContentSize))
00222          throw CUDTException(5, 3, 0);
00223 
00224       m_iMSS = *(int*)optval;
00225 
00226       // Packet size cannot be greater than UDP buffer size
00227       if (m_iMSS > m_iUDPSndBufSize)
00228          m_iMSS = m_iUDPSndBufSize;
00229       if (m_iMSS > m_iUDPRcvBufSize)
00230          m_iMSS = m_iUDPRcvBufSize;
00231 
00232       break;
00233 
00234    case UDT_SNDSYN:
00235       m_bSynSending = *(bool *)optval;
00236       break;
00237 
00238    case UDT_RCVSYN:
00239       m_bSynRecving = *(bool *)optval;
00240       break;
00241 
00242    case UDT_CC:
00243       if (m_bConnected)
00244          throw CUDTException(5, 1, 0);
00245       if (NULL != m_pCCFactory)
00246          delete m_pCCFactory;
00247       m_pCCFactory = ((CCCVirtualFactory *)optval)->clone();
00248 
00249       break;
00250 
00251    case UDT_FC:
00252       if (m_bConnected)
00253          throw CUDTException(5, 2, 0);
00254 
00255       if (*(int*)optval < 1)
00256          throw CUDTException(5, 3);
00257 
00258       // Mimimum recv flight flag size is 32 packets
00259       if (*(int*)optval > 32)
00260          m_iFlightFlagSize = *(int*)optval;
00261       else
00262          m_iFlightFlagSize = 32;
00263 
00264       break;
00265 
00266    case UDT_SNDBUF:
00267       if (m_bOpened)
00268          throw CUDTException(5, 1, 0);
00269 
00270       if (*(int*)optval <= 0)
00271          throw CUDTException(5, 3, 0);
00272 
00273       m_iSndBufSize = *(int*)optval / (m_iMSS - 28);
00274 
00275       break;
00276 
00277    case UDT_RCVBUF:
00278       if (m_bOpened)
00279          throw CUDTException(5, 1, 0);
00280 
00281       if (*(int*)optval <= 0)
00282          throw CUDTException(5, 3, 0);
00283 
00284       // Mimimum recv buffer size is 32 packets
00285       if (*(int*)optval > (m_iMSS - 28) * 32)
00286          m_iRcvBufSize = *(int*)optval / (m_iMSS - 28);
00287       else
00288          m_iRcvBufSize = 32;
00289 
00290       // recv buffer MUST not be greater than FC size
00291       if (m_iRcvBufSize > m_iFlightFlagSize)
00292          m_iRcvBufSize = m_iFlightFlagSize;
00293 
00294       break;
00295 
00296    case UDT_LINGER:
00297       m_Linger = *(linger*)optval;
00298       break;
00299 
00300    case UDP_SNDBUF:
00301       if (m_bOpened)
00302          throw CUDTException(5, 1, 0);
00303 
00304       m_iUDPSndBufSize = *(int*)optval;
00305 
00306       if (m_iUDPSndBufSize < m_iMSS)
00307          m_iUDPSndBufSize = m_iMSS;
00308 
00309       break;
00310 
00311    case UDP_RCVBUF:
00312       if (m_bOpened)
00313          throw CUDTException(5, 1, 0);
00314 
00315       m_iUDPRcvBufSize = *(int*)optval;
00316 
00317       if (m_iUDPRcvBufSize < m_iMSS)
00318          m_iUDPRcvBufSize = m_iMSS;
00319 
00320       break;
00321 
00322    case UDT_RENDEZVOUS:
00323       if (m_bConnected)
00324          throw CUDTException(5, 1, 0);
00325       m_bRendezvous = *(bool *)optval;
00326       break;
00327 
00328    case UDT_SNDTIMEO: 
00329       m_iSndTimeOut = *(int*)optval; 
00330       break; 
00331     
00332    case UDT_RCVTIMEO: 
00333       m_iRcvTimeOut = *(int*)optval; 
00334       break; 
00335 
00336    case UDT_REUSEADDR:
00337       if (m_bOpened)
00338          throw CUDTException(5, 1, 0);
00339       m_bReuseAddr = *(bool*)optval;
00340       break;
00341 
00342    case UDT_MAXBW:
00343       if (m_bConnected)
00344          throw CUDTException(5, 1, 0);
00345       m_llMaxBW = *(int64_t*)optval;
00346       break;
00347     
00348    default:
00349       throw CUDTException(5, 0, 0);
00350    }
00351 }
00352 
00353 void CUDT::getOpt(UDTOpt optName, void* optval, int& optlen)
00354 {
00355    CGuard cg(m_ConnectionLock);
00356 
00357    switch (optName)
00358    {
00359    case UDT_MSS:
00360       *(int*)optval = m_iMSS;
00361       optlen = sizeof(int);
00362       break;
00363 
00364    case UDT_SNDSYN:
00365       *(bool*)optval = m_bSynSending;
00366       optlen = sizeof(bool);
00367       break;
00368 
00369    case UDT_RCVSYN:
00370       *(bool*)optval = m_bSynRecving;
00371       optlen = sizeof(bool);
00372       break;
00373 
00374    case UDT_CC:
00375       if (!m_bOpened)
00376          throw CUDTException(5, 5, 0);
00377       *(CCC**)optval = m_pCC;
00378       optlen = sizeof(CCC*);
00379 
00380       break;
00381 
00382    case UDT_FC:
00383       *(int*)optval = m_iFlightFlagSize;
00384       optlen = sizeof(int);
00385       break;
00386 
00387    case UDT_SNDBUF:
00388       *(int*)optval = m_iSndBufSize * (m_iMSS - 28);
00389       optlen = sizeof(int);
00390       break;
00391 
00392    case UDT_RCVBUF:
00393       *(int*)optval = m_iRcvBufSize * (m_iMSS - 28);
00394       optlen = sizeof(int);
00395       break;
00396 
00397    case UDT_LINGER:
00398       if (optlen < (int)(sizeof(linger)))
00399          throw CUDTException(5, 3, 0);
00400 
00401       *(linger*)optval = m_Linger;
00402       optlen = sizeof(linger);
00403       break;
00404 
00405    case UDP_SNDBUF:
00406       *(int*)optval = m_iUDPSndBufSize;
00407       optlen = sizeof(int);
00408       break;
00409 
00410    case UDP_RCVBUF:
00411       *(int*)optval = m_iUDPRcvBufSize;
00412       optlen = sizeof(int);
00413       break;
00414 
00415    case UDT_RENDEZVOUS:
00416       *(bool *)optval = m_bRendezvous;
00417       optlen = sizeof(bool);
00418       break;
00419 
00420    case UDT_SNDTIMEO: 
00421       *(int*)optval = m_iSndTimeOut; 
00422       optlen = sizeof(int); 
00423       break; 
00424     
00425    case UDT_RCVTIMEO: 
00426       *(int*)optval = m_iRcvTimeOut; 
00427       optlen = sizeof(int); 
00428       break; 
00429 
00430    case UDT_REUSEADDR:
00431       *(bool *)optval = m_bReuseAddr;
00432       optlen = sizeof(bool);
00433       break;
00434 
00435    case UDT_MAXBW:
00436       *(int64_t*)optval = m_llMaxBW;
00437       break;
00438 
00439    default:
00440       throw CUDTException(5, 0, 0);
00441    }
00442 }
00443 
00444 void CUDT::open()
00445 {
00446    CGuard cg(m_ConnectionLock);
00447 
00448    // Initial sequence number, loss, acknowledgement, etc.
00449    m_iPktSize = m_iMSS - 28;
00450    m_iPayloadSize = m_iPktSize - CPacket::m_iPktHdrSize;
00451 
00452    m_iEXPCount = 1;
00453    m_iBandwidth = 1;
00454    m_iDeliveryRate = 16;
00455    m_iAckSeqNo = 0;
00456    m_ullLastAckTime = 0;
00457 
00458    // trace information
00459    m_StartTime = CTimer::getTime();
00460    m_llSentTotal = m_llRecvTotal = m_iSndLossTotal = m_iRcvLossTotal = m_iRetransTotal = m_iSentACKTotal = m_iRecvACKTotal = m_iSentNAKTotal = m_iRecvNAKTotal = 0;
00461    m_LastSampleTime = CTimer::getTime();
00462    m_llTraceSent = m_llTraceRecv = m_iTraceSndLoss = m_iTraceRcvLoss = m_iTraceRetrans = m_iSentACK = m_iRecvACK = m_iSentNAK = m_iRecvNAK = 0;
00463    m_llSndDuration = m_llSndDurationTotal = 0;
00464 
00465    // structures for queue
00466    if (NULL == m_pSNode)
00467       m_pSNode = new CSNode;
00468    m_pSNode->m_pUDT = this;
00469    m_pSNode->m_llTimeStamp = 1;
00470    m_pSNode->m_iHeapLoc = -1;
00471 
00472    if (NULL == m_pRNode)
00473       m_pRNode = new CRNode;
00474    m_pRNode->m_pUDT = this;
00475    m_pRNode->m_llTimeStamp = 1;
00476    m_pRNode->m_pPrev = m_pRNode->m_pNext = NULL;
00477    m_pRNode->m_bOnList = false;
00478 
00479    m_iRTT = 10 * m_iSYNInterval;
00480    m_iRTTVar = m_iRTT >> 1;
00481    m_ullCPUFrequency = CTimer::getCPUFrequency();
00482 
00483    // set up the timers
00484    m_ullSYNInt = m_iSYNInterval * m_ullCPUFrequency;
00485   
00486    // set minimum NAK and EXP timeout to 100ms
00487    m_ullMinNakInt = 100000 * m_ullCPUFrequency;
00488    m_ullMinExpInt = 100000 * m_ullCPUFrequency;
00489 
00490    m_ullACKInt = m_ullSYNInt;
00491    m_ullNAKInt = m_ullMinNakInt;
00492    m_ullEXPInt = m_ullMinExpInt;
00493    m_llLastRspTime = CTimer::getTime();
00494 
00495    CTimer::rdtsc(m_ullNextACKTime);
00496    m_ullNextACKTime += m_ullSYNInt;
00497    CTimer::rdtsc(m_ullNextNAKTime);
00498    m_ullNextNAKTime += m_ullNAKInt;
00499    CTimer::rdtsc(m_ullNextEXPTime);
00500    m_ullNextEXPTime += m_ullEXPInt;
00501 
00502    m_iPktCount = 0;
00503    m_iLightACKCount = 1;
00504 
00505    m_ullTargetTime = 0;
00506    m_ullTimeDiff = 0;
00507 
00508    // Now UDT is opened.
00509    m_bOpened = true;
00510 }
00511 
00512 void CUDT::listen()
00513 {
00514    CGuard cg(m_ConnectionLock);
00515 
00516    if (!m_bOpened)
00517       throw CUDTException(5, 0, 0);
00518 
00519    if (m_bConnected)
00520       throw CUDTException(5, 2, 0);
00521 
00522    // listen can be called more than once
00523    if (m_bListening)
00524       return;
00525 
00526    // if there is already another socket listening on the same port
00527    if (m_pRcvQueue->setListener(this) < 0)
00528       throw CUDTException(5, 11, 0);
00529 
00530    m_bListening = true;
00531 }
00532 
00533 void CUDT::connect(const sockaddr* serv_addr)
00534 {
00535    CGuard cg(m_ConnectionLock);
00536 
00537    if (!m_bOpened)
00538       throw CUDTException(5, 0, 0);
00539 
00540    if (m_bListening)
00541       throw CUDTException(5, 2, 0);
00542 
00543    if (m_bConnected)
00544       throw CUDTException(5, 2, 0);
00545 
00546    // register this socket in the rendezvous queue
00547    // RendezevousQueue is used to temporarily store incoming handshake, non-rendezvous connections also require this function
00548    m_pRcvQueue->m_pRendezvousQueue->insert(m_SocketID, m_iIPversion, serv_addr);
00549 
00550    CPacket request;
00551    char* reqdata = new char [m_iPayloadSize];
00552    CHandShake req;
00553 
00554    CPacket response;
00555    char* resdata = new char [m_iPayloadSize];
00556    CHandShake res;
00557 
00558    // This is my current configurations
00559    req.m_iVersion = m_iVersion;
00560    req.m_iType = m_iSockType;
00561    req.m_iMSS = m_iMSS;
00562    req.m_iFlightFlagSize = (m_iRcvBufSize < m_iFlightFlagSize)? m_iRcvBufSize : m_iFlightFlagSize;
00563    req.m_iReqType = (!m_bRendezvous) ? 1 : 0;
00564    req.m_iID = m_SocketID;
00565    CIPAddress::ntop(serv_addr, req.m_piPeerIP, m_iIPversion);
00566 
00567    // Random Initial Sequence Number
00568    srand((unsigned int)CTimer::getTime());
00569    m_iISN = req.m_iISN = (int32_t)(CSeqNo::m_iMaxSeqNo * (double(rand()) / RAND_MAX));
00570 
00571    m_iLastDecSeq = req.m_iISN - 1;
00572    m_iSndLastAck = req.m_iISN;
00573    m_iSndLastDataAck = req.m_iISN;
00574    m_iSndCurrSeqNo = req.m_iISN - 1;
00575    m_iSndLastAck2 = req.m_iISN;
00576    m_ullSndLastAck2Time = CTimer::getTime();
00577 
00578    // Inform the server my configurations.
00579    request.pack(0, NULL, reqdata, m_iPayloadSize);
00580    // ID = 0, connection request
00581    request.m_iID = 0;
00582 
00583    // Wait for the negotiated configurations from the peer side.
00584    response.pack(0, NULL, resdata, m_iPayloadSize);
00585 
00586    uint64_t timeo = 3000000;
00587    if (m_bRendezvous)
00588       timeo *= 10;
00589    uint64_t entertime = CTimer::getTime();
00590    uint64_t last_req_time = 0;
00591 
00592    CUDTException e(0, 0);
00593    char* tmp = NULL;
00594 
00595    while (!m_bClosing)
00596    {
00597       // avoid sending too many requests, at most 1 request per 250ms
00598       if (CTimer::getTime() - last_req_time > 250000)
00599       {
00600          req.serialize(reqdata, m_iPayloadSize);
00601          request.setLength(CHandShake::m_iContentSize);
00602          m_pSndQueue->sendto(serv_addr, request);
00603 
00604          last_req_time = CTimer::getTime();
00605       }
00606 
00607       response.setLength(m_iPayloadSize);
00608       if (m_pRcvQueue->recvfrom(m_SocketID, response) > 0)
00609       {
00610          if (m_bRendezvous && ((0 == response.getFlag()) || (1 == response.getType())) && (NULL != tmp))
00611          {
00612             // a data packet or a keep-alive packet comes, which means the peer side is already connected
00613             // in this situation, a previously recorded response (tmp) will be used
00614             res.deserialize(tmp, CHandShake::m_iContentSize);
00615             memcpy(m_piSelfIP, res.m_piPeerIP, 16);
00616             break;
00617          }
00618 
00619          if ((1 != response.getFlag()) || (0 != response.getType()))
00620             response.setLength(-1);
00621          else
00622          {
00623             res.deserialize(response.m_pcData, response.getLength());
00624 
00625             if (m_bRendezvous)
00626             {
00627                // regular connect should NOT communicate with rendezvous connect
00628                // rendezvous connect require 3-way handshake
00629                if (1 == res.m_iReqType)
00630                   response.setLength(-1);
00631                else if ((0 == res.m_iReqType) || (0 == req.m_iReqType))
00632                {
00633                   if (NULL == tmp)
00634                      tmp = new char [m_iPayloadSize];
00635                   res.serialize(tmp, m_iPayloadSize);
00636 
00637                   req.m_iReqType = -1;
00638                   request.m_iID = res.m_iID;
00639                   response.setLength(-1);
00640                }
00641             }
00642             else
00643             {
00644                // set cookie
00645                if (1 == res.m_iReqType)
00646                {
00647                   req.m_iReqType = -1;
00648                   req.m_iCookie = res.m_iCookie;
00649                   response.setLength(-1);
00650                }
00651             }
00652          }
00653 
00654          // new request/response should be sent out immediately on receving a response
00655          last_req_time = 0;
00656       }
00657 
00658       if (response.getLength() > 0)
00659       {
00660          memcpy(m_piSelfIP, res.m_piPeerIP, 16);
00661          break;
00662       }
00663 
00664       if (CTimer::getTime() > entertime + timeo)
00665       {
00666          // timeout
00667          e = CUDTException(1, 1, 0);
00668          break;
00669       }
00670    }
00671 
00672    delete [] tmp;
00673    delete [] reqdata;
00674    delete [] resdata;
00675 
00676    // remove from rendezvous queue
00677    m_pRcvQueue->m_pRendezvousQueue->remove(m_SocketID);
00678 
00679    if (e.getErrorCode() == 0)
00680    {
00681       if (m_bClosing)                                           // if the socket is closed before connection...
00682          e = CUDTException(1);
00683       else if (1002 == res.m_iReqType)                          // connection request rejected
00684          e = CUDTException(1, 2, 0);
00685       else if ((!m_bRendezvous) && (m_iISN != res.m_iISN))      // secuity check
00686          e = CUDTException(1, 4, 0);
00687    }
00688 
00689    if (e.getErrorCode() != 0)
00690    {
00691       throw e;
00692    }
00693 
00694    // Got it. Re-configure according to the negotiated values.
00695    m_iMSS = res.m_iMSS;
00696    m_iFlowWindowSize = res.m_iFlightFlagSize;
00697    m_iPktSize = m_iMSS - 28;
00698    m_iPayloadSize = m_iPktSize - CPacket::m_iPktHdrSize;
00699    m_iPeerISN = res.m_iISN;
00700    m_iRcvLastAck = res.m_iISN;
00701    m_iRcvLastAckAck = res.m_iISN;
00702    m_iRcvCurrSeqNo = res.m_iISN - 1;
00703    m_PeerID = res.m_iID;
00704 
00705    // Prepare all data structures
00706    try
00707    {
00708       m_pSndBuffer = new CSndBuffer(32, m_iPayloadSize);
00709       m_pRcvBuffer = new CRcvBuffer(&(m_pRcvQueue->m_UnitQueue), m_iRcvBufSize);
00710       // after introducing lite ACK, the sndlosslist may not be cleared in time, so it requires twice space.
00711       m_pSndLossList = new CSndLossList(m_iFlowWindowSize * 2);
00712       m_pRcvLossList = new CRcvLossList(m_iFlightFlagSize);
00713       m_pACKWindow = new CACKWindow(1024);
00714       m_pRcvTimeWindow = new CPktTimeWindow(16, 64);
00715       m_pSndTimeWindow = new CPktTimeWindow();
00716    }
00717    catch (...)
00718    {
00719       throw CUDTException(3, 2, 0);
00720    }
00721 
00722    m_pCC = m_pCCFactory->create();
00723    m_pCC->m_UDT = m_SocketID;
00724    m_ullInterval = (uint64_t)(m_pCC->m_dPktSndPeriod * m_ullCPUFrequency);
00725    m_dCongestionWindow = m_pCC->m_dCWndSize;
00726 
00727    CInfoBlock ib;
00728    ib.m_iIPversion = m_iIPversion;
00729    CInfoBlock::convert(serv_addr, m_iIPversion, ib.m_piIP);
00730    if (m_pCache->lookup(&ib) >= 0)
00731    {
00732       m_iRTT = ib.m_iRTT;
00733       m_iBandwidth = ib.m_iBandwidth;
00734    }
00735 
00736    m_pCC->setMSS(m_iMSS);
00737    m_pCC->setMaxCWndSize((int&)m_iFlowWindowSize);
00738    m_pCC->setSndCurrSeqNo((int32_t&)m_iSndCurrSeqNo);
00739    m_pCC->setRcvRate(m_iDeliveryRate);
00740    m_pCC->setRTT(m_iRTT);
00741    m_pCC->setBandwidth(m_iBandwidth);
00742    if (m_llMaxBW > 0) m_pCC->setUserParam((char*)&(m_llMaxBW), 8);
00743    m_pCC->init();
00744 
00745    m_pPeerAddr = (AF_INET == m_iIPversion) ? (sockaddr*)new sockaddr_in : (sockaddr*)new sockaddr_in6;
00746    memcpy(m_pPeerAddr, serv_addr, (AF_INET == m_iIPversion) ? sizeof(sockaddr_in) : sizeof(sockaddr_in6));
00747 
00748    // And, I am connected too.
00749    m_bConnected = true;
00750 
00751    // register this socket for receiving data packets
00752    m_pRNode->m_bOnList = true;
00753    m_pRcvQueue->setNewEntry(this);
00754 
00755    // acknowledde any waiting epolls to read/write
00756    s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.enable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
00757    s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.enable_write(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
00758 }
00759 
00760 void CUDT::connect(const sockaddr* peer, CHandShake* hs)
00761 {
00762    CGuard cg(m_ConnectionLock);
00763 
00764    // Uses the smaller MSS between the peers        
00765    if (hs->m_iMSS > m_iMSS)
00766       hs->m_iMSS = m_iMSS;
00767    else
00768       m_iMSS = hs->m_iMSS;
00769 
00770    // exchange info for maximum flow window size
00771    m_iFlowWindowSize = hs->m_iFlightFlagSize;
00772    hs->m_iFlightFlagSize = (m_iRcvBufSize < m_iFlightFlagSize)? m_iRcvBufSize : m_iFlightFlagSize;
00773 
00774    m_iPeerISN = hs->m_iISN;
00775 
00776    m_iRcvLastAck = hs->m_iISN;
00777    m_iRcvLastAckAck = hs->m_iISN;
00778    m_iRcvCurrSeqNo = hs->m_iISN - 1;
00779 
00780    m_PeerID = hs->m_iID;
00781    hs->m_iID = m_SocketID;
00782 
00783    // use peer's ISN and send it back for security check
00784    m_iISN = hs->m_iISN;
00785 
00786    m_iLastDecSeq = m_iISN - 1;
00787    m_iSndLastAck = m_iISN;
00788    m_iSndLastDataAck = m_iISN;
00789    m_iSndCurrSeqNo = m_iISN - 1;
00790    m_iSndLastAck2 = m_iISN;
00791    m_ullSndLastAck2Time = CTimer::getTime();
00792 
00793    // this is a reponse handshake
00794    hs->m_iReqType = -1;
00795 
00796    // get local IP address and send the peer its IP address (because UDP cannot get local IP address)
00797    memcpy(m_piSelfIP, hs->m_piPeerIP, 16);
00798    CIPAddress::ntop(peer, hs->m_piPeerIP, m_iIPversion);
00799   
00800    m_iPktSize = m_iMSS - 28;
00801    m_iPayloadSize = m_iPktSize - CPacket::m_iPktHdrSize;
00802 
00803    // Prepare all structures
00804    try
00805    {
00806       m_pSndBuffer = new CSndBuffer(32, m_iPayloadSize);
00807       m_pRcvBuffer = new CRcvBuffer(&(m_pRcvQueue->m_UnitQueue), m_iRcvBufSize);
00808       m_pSndLossList = new CSndLossList(m_iFlowWindowSize * 2);
00809       m_pRcvLossList = new CRcvLossList(m_iFlightFlagSize);
00810       m_pACKWindow = new CACKWindow(1024);
00811       m_pRcvTimeWindow = new CPktTimeWindow(16, 64);
00812       m_pSndTimeWindow = new CPktTimeWindow();
00813    }
00814    catch (...)
00815    {
00816       throw CUDTException(3, 2, 0);
00817    }
00818 
00819    m_pCC = m_pCCFactory->create();
00820    m_pCC->m_UDT = m_SocketID;
00821    m_ullInterval = (uint64_t)(m_pCC->m_dPktSndPeriod * m_ullCPUFrequency);
00822    m_dCongestionWindow = m_pCC->m_dCWndSize;
00823 
00824    CInfoBlock ib;
00825    ib.m_iIPversion = m_iIPversion;
00826    CInfoBlock::convert(peer, m_iIPversion, ib.m_piIP);
00827    if (m_pCache->lookup(&ib) >= 0)
00828    {
00829       m_iRTT = ib.m_iRTT;
00830       m_iBandwidth = ib.m_iBandwidth;
00831    }
00832 
00833    m_pCC->setMSS(m_iMSS);
00834    m_pCC->setMaxCWndSize((int&)m_iFlowWindowSize);
00835    m_pCC->setSndCurrSeqNo((int32_t&)m_iSndCurrSeqNo);
00836    m_pCC->setRcvRate(m_iDeliveryRate);
00837    m_pCC->setRTT(m_iRTT);
00838    m_pCC->setBandwidth(m_iBandwidth);
00839    if (m_llMaxBW > 0) m_pCC->setUserParam((char*)&(m_llMaxBW), 8);
00840    m_pCC->init();
00841 
00842    m_pPeerAddr = (AF_INET == m_iIPversion) ? (sockaddr*)new sockaddr_in : (sockaddr*)new sockaddr_in6;
00843    memcpy(m_pPeerAddr, peer, (AF_INET == m_iIPversion) ? sizeof(sockaddr_in) : sizeof(sockaddr_in6));
00844 
00845    // And of course, it is connected.
00846    m_bConnected = true;
00847 
00848    // register this socket for receiving data packets
00849    m_pRNode->m_bOnList = true;
00850    m_pRcvQueue->setNewEntry(this);
00851 
00852    //send the response to the peer, see listen() for more discussions about this
00853    CPacket response;
00854    int size = CHandShake::m_iContentSize;
00855    char* buffer = new char[size];
00856    hs->serialize(buffer, size);
00857    response.pack(0, NULL, buffer, size);
00858    response.m_iID = m_PeerID;
00859    m_pSndQueue->sendto(peer, response);
00860    delete [] buffer;
00861 }
00862 
00863 void CUDT::close()
00864 {
00865    if (!m_bOpened)
00866       return;
00867 
00868    if (0 != m_Linger.l_onoff)
00869    {
00870       uint64_t entertime = CTimer::getTime();
00871 
00872       while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && (m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize() > 0) && (CTimer::getTime() - entertime < m_Linger.l_linger * 1000000ULL))
00873       {
00874          // linger has been checked by previous close() call and has expired
00875          if (m_ullLingerExpiration >= entertime)
00876             break;
00877 
00878          if (!m_bSynSending)
00879          {
00880             // if this socket enables asynchronous sending, return immediately and let GC to close it later
00881             if (0 == m_ullLingerExpiration)
00882                m_ullLingerExpiration = entertime + m_Linger.l_linger * 1000000ULL;
00883 
00884             return;
00885          }
00886 
00887          #ifndef WIN32
00888             timespec ts;
00889             ts.tv_sec = 0;
00890             ts.tv_nsec = 1000000;
00891             nanosleep(&ts, NULL);
00892          #else
00893             Sleep(1);
00894          #endif
00895       }
00896    }
00897 
00898    // remove this socket from the snd queue
00899    if (m_bConnected)
00900       m_pSndQueue->m_pSndUList->remove(this);
00901 
00902    // remove itself from all epoll monitoring
00903    for (set<int>::iterator i = m_sPollID.begin(); i != m_sPollID.end(); ++ i)
00904       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.remove_usock(*i, m_SocketID);
00905 
00906    CGuard cg(m_ConnectionLock);
00907 
00908    if (!m_bOpened)
00909       return;
00910 
00911    // Inform the threads handler to stop.
00912    m_bClosing = true;
00913 
00914    // Signal the sender and recver if they are waiting for data.
00915    releaseSynch();
00916 
00917    if (m_bListening)
00918    {
00919       m_bListening = false;
00920       m_pRcvQueue->removeListener(this);
00921    }
00922    if (m_bConnected)
00923    {
00924       if (!m_bShutdown)
00925          sendCtrl(5);
00926 
00927       m_pCC->close();
00928 
00929       CInfoBlock ib;
00930       ib.m_iIPversion = m_iIPversion;
00931       CInfoBlock::convert(m_pPeerAddr, m_iIPversion, ib.m_piIP);
00932       ib.m_iRTT = m_iRTT;
00933       ib.m_iBandwidth = m_iBandwidth;
00934       m_pCache->update(&ib);
00935 
00936       m_bConnected = false;
00937    }
00938 
00939    // waiting all send and recv calls to stop
00940    CGuard sendguard(m_SendLock);
00941    CGuard recvguard(m_RecvLock);
00942 
00943    // CLOSED.
00944    m_bOpened = false;
00945 }
00946 
00947 int CUDT::send(const char* data, const int& len)
00948 {
00949    if (UDT_DGRAM == m_iSockType)
00950       throw CUDTException(5, 10, 0);
00951 
00952    // throw an exception if not connected
00953    if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
00954       throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
00955    else if (!m_bConnected)
00956       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
00957 
00958    if (len <= 0)
00959       return 0;
00960 
00961    CGuard sendguard(m_SendLock);
00962 
00963    if (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize())
00964    {
00965       if (!m_bSynSending)
00966          throw CUDTException(6, 1, 0);
00967       else
00968       {
00969          // wait here during a blocking sending
00970          #ifndef WIN32
00971             pthread_mutex_lock(&m_SendBlockLock);
00972             if (m_iSndTimeOut < 0) 
00973             { 
00974                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) && m_bPeerHealth)
00975                   pthread_cond_wait(&m_SendBlockCond, &m_SendBlockLock);
00976             }
00977             else
00978             {
00979                uint64_t exptime = CTimer::getTime() + m_iSndTimeOut * 1000ULL;
00980                timespec locktime; 
00981     
00982                locktime.tv_sec = exptime / 1000000;
00983                locktime.tv_nsec = (exptime % 1000000) * 1000;
00984 
00985                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) && m_bPeerHealth && (CTimer::getTime() < exptime))
00986                   pthread_cond_timedwait(&m_SendBlockCond, &m_SendBlockLock, &locktime);
00987             }
00988             pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_SendBlockLock);
00989          #else
00990             if (m_iSndTimeOut < 0)
00991             {
00992                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) && m_bPeerHealth)
00993                   WaitForSingleObject(m_SendBlockCond, INFINITE);
00994             }
00995             else 
00996             {
00997                uint64_t exptime = CTimer::getTime() + m_iSndTimeOut * 1000ULL;
00998 
00999                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) && m_bPeerHealth && (CTimer::getTime() < exptime))
01000                   WaitForSingleObject(m_SendBlockCond, DWORD((exptime - CTimer::getTime()) / 1000)); 
01001             }
01002          #endif
01003 
01004          // check the connection status
01005          if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
01006             throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01007          else if (!m_bConnected)
01008             throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01009          else if (!m_bPeerHealth)
01010          {
01011             m_bPeerHealth = true;
01012             throw CUDTException(7);
01013          }
01014       }
01015    }
01016 
01017    if (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize())
01018    {
01019       if (m_iSndTimeOut >= 0)
01020          throw CUDTException(6, 1, 0); 
01021 
01022       return 0;
01023    }
01024 
01025    int size = (m_iSndBufSize - m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) * m_iPayloadSize;
01026    if (size > len)
01027       size = len;
01028 
01029    // record total time used for sending
01030    if (0 == m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize())
01031       m_llSndDurationCounter = CTimer::getTime();
01032 
01033    // insert the user buffer into the sening list
01034    m_pSndBuffer->addBuffer(data, size);
01035 
01036    // insert this socket to snd list if it is not on the list yet
01037    m_pSndQueue->m_pSndUList->update(this, false);
01038 
01039    if (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize())
01040    {
01041       // write is not available any more
01042       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.disable_write(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
01043    }
01044 
01045    return size;
01046 }
01047 
01048 int CUDT::recv(char* data, const int& len)
01049 {
01050    if (UDT_DGRAM == m_iSockType)
01051       throw CUDTException(5, 10, 0);
01052 
01053    // throw an exception if not connected
01054    if (!m_bConnected)
01055       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01056    else if ((m_bBroken || m_bClosing) && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01057       throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01058 
01059    if (len <= 0)
01060       return 0;
01061 
01062    CGuard recvguard(m_RecvLock);
01063 
01064    if (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize())
01065    {
01066       if (!m_bSynRecving)
01067          throw CUDTException(6, 2, 0);
01068       else
01069       {
01070          #ifndef WIN32
01071             pthread_mutex_lock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01072             if (m_iRcvTimeOut < 0) 
01073             { 
01074                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01075                   pthread_cond_wait(&m_RecvDataCond, &m_RecvDataLock);
01076             }
01077             else
01078             {
01079                uint64_t exptime = CTimer::getTime() + m_iRcvTimeOut * 1000ULL; 
01080                timespec locktime; 
01081     
01082                locktime.tv_sec = exptime / 1000000;
01083                locktime.tv_nsec = (exptime % 1000000) * 1000;
01084 
01085                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01086                {
01087                   pthread_cond_timedwait(&m_RecvDataCond, &m_RecvDataLock, &locktime); 
01088                   if (CTimer::getTime() >= exptime)
01089                      break;
01090                }
01091             }
01092             pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01093          #else
01094             if (m_iRcvTimeOut < 0)
01095             {
01096                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01097                   WaitForSingleObject(m_RecvDataCond, INFINITE);
01098             }
01099             else
01100             {
01101                uint64_t enter_time = CTimer::getTime();
01102 
01103                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01104                {
01105                   int diff = int(CTimer::getTime() - enter_time) / 1000;
01106                   if (diff >= m_iRcvTimeOut)
01107                       break;
01108                   WaitForSingleObject(m_RecvDataCond, DWORD(m_iRcvTimeOut - diff ));
01109                }
01110             }
01111          #endif
01112       }
01113    }
01114 
01115    // throw an exception if not connected
01116    if (!m_bConnected)
01117       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01118    else if ((m_bBroken || m_bClosing) && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01119       throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01120 
01121    int res = m_pRcvBuffer->readBuffer(data, len);
01122 
01123    if (m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize() <= 0)
01124    {
01125       // read is not available any more
01126       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.disable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
01127    }
01128 
01129    if ((res <= 0) && (m_iRcvTimeOut >= 0))
01130       throw CUDTException(6, 2, 0);
01131 
01132    return res;
01133 }
01134 
01135 int CUDT::sendmsg(const char* data, const int& len, const int& msttl, const bool& inorder)
01136 {
01137    if (UDT_STREAM == m_iSockType)
01138       throw CUDTException(5, 9, 0);
01139 
01140    // throw an exception if not connected
01141    if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
01142       throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01143    else if (!m_bConnected)
01144       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01145 
01146    if (len <= 0)
01147       return 0;
01148 
01149    if (len > m_iSndBufSize * m_iPayloadSize)
01150       throw CUDTException(5, 12, 0);
01151 
01152    CGuard sendguard(m_SendLock);
01153 
01154    if ((m_iSndBufSize - m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) * m_iPayloadSize < len)
01155    {
01156       if (!m_bSynSending)
01157          throw CUDTException(6, 1, 0);
01158       else
01159       {
01160          // wait here during a blocking sending
01161          #ifndef WIN32
01162             pthread_mutex_lock(&m_SendBlockLock);
01163             if (m_iSndTimeOut < 0)
01164             {
01165                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && ((m_iSndBufSize - m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) * m_iPayloadSize < len))
01166                   pthread_cond_wait(&m_SendBlockCond, &m_SendBlockLock);
01167             }
01168             else
01169             {
01170                uint64_t exptime = CTimer::getTime() + m_iSndTimeOut * 1000ULL;
01171                timespec locktime;
01172 
01173                locktime.tv_sec = exptime / 1000000;
01174                locktime.tv_nsec = (exptime % 1000000) * 1000;
01175 
01176                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && ((m_iSndBufSize - m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) * m_iPayloadSize < len) && (CTimer::getTime() < exptime))
01177                   pthread_cond_timedwait(&m_SendBlockCond, &m_SendBlockLock, &locktime);
01178             }
01179             pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_SendBlockLock);
01180          #else
01181             if (m_iSndTimeOut < 0)
01182             {
01183                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && ((m_iSndBufSize - m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) * m_iPayloadSize < len))
01184                   WaitForSingleObject(m_SendBlockCond, INFINITE);
01185             }
01186             else
01187             {
01188                uint64_t exptime = CTimer::getTime() + m_iSndTimeOut * 1000ULL;
01189 
01190                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && ((m_iSndBufSize - m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) * m_iPayloadSize < len) && (CTimer::getTime() < exptime))
01191                   WaitForSingleObject(m_SendBlockCond, DWORD((exptime - CTimer::getTime()) / 1000));
01192             }
01193          #endif
01194 
01195          // check the connection status
01196          if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
01197             throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01198          else if (!m_bConnected)
01199             throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01200       }
01201    }
01202 
01203    if ((m_iSndBufSize - m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) * m_iPayloadSize < len)
01204    {
01205       if (m_iSndTimeOut >= 0)
01206          throw CUDTException(6, 1, 0);
01207 
01208       return 0;
01209    }
01210 
01211    // record total time used for sending
01212    if (0 == m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize())
01213       m_llSndDurationCounter = CTimer::getTime();
01214 
01215    // insert the user buffer into the sening list
01216    m_pSndBuffer->addBuffer(data, len, msttl, inorder);
01217 
01218    // insert this socket to the snd list if it is not on the list yet
01219    m_pSndQueue->m_pSndUList->update(this, false);
01220 
01221    if (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize())
01222    {
01223       // write is not available any more
01224       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.disable_write(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
01225    }
01226 
01227    return len;   
01228 }
01229 
01230 int CUDT::recvmsg(char* data, const int& len)
01231 {
01232    if (UDT_STREAM == m_iSockType)
01233       throw CUDTException(5, 9, 0);
01234 
01235    // throw an exception if not connected
01236    if (!m_bConnected)
01237       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01238 
01239    if (len <= 0)
01240       return 0;
01241 
01242    CGuard recvguard(m_RecvLock);
01243 
01244    if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
01245    {
01246       int res = m_pRcvBuffer->readMsg(data, len);
01247       if (0 == res)
01248       {
01249          // read is not available
01250          s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.disable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
01251 
01252          throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01253       }
01254       else
01255          return res;
01256    }
01257 
01258    if (!m_bSynRecving)
01259    {
01260       int res = m_pRcvBuffer->readMsg(data, len);
01261       if (0 == res)
01262          throw CUDTException(6, 2, 0);
01263       else
01264          return res;
01265    }
01266 
01267    int res = 0;
01268    bool timeout = false;
01269 
01270    do
01271    {
01272       #ifndef WIN32
01273          pthread_mutex_lock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01274 
01275          if (m_iRcvTimeOut < 0)
01276          {
01277             while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (0 == (res = m_pRcvBuffer->readMsg(data, len))))
01278                pthread_cond_wait(&m_RecvDataCond, &m_RecvDataLock);
01279          }
01280          else
01281          {
01282             uint64_t exptime = CTimer::getTime() + m_iRcvTimeOut * 1000ULL;
01283             timespec locktime;
01284 
01285             locktime.tv_sec = exptime / 1000000;
01286             locktime.tv_nsec = (exptime % 1000000) * 1000;
01287 
01288             if (pthread_cond_timedwait(&m_RecvDataCond, &m_RecvDataLock, &locktime) == ETIMEDOUT)
01289                timeout = true;
01290 
01291             res = m_pRcvBuffer->readMsg(data, len);           
01292          }
01293          pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01294       #else
01295          if (m_iRcvTimeOut < 0)
01296          {
01297             while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (0 == (res = m_pRcvBuffer->readMsg(data, len))))
01298                WaitForSingleObject(m_RecvDataCond, INFINITE);
01299          }
01300          else
01301          {
01302             if (WaitForSingleObject(m_RecvDataCond, DWORD(m_iRcvTimeOut)) == WAIT_TIMEOUT)
01303                timeout = true;
01304 
01305             res = m_pRcvBuffer->readMsg(data, len);
01306          }
01307       #endif
01308 
01309       if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
01310          throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01311       else if (!m_bConnected)
01312          throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01313    } while ((0 == res) && !timeout);
01314 
01315    if (m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvMsgNum() <= 0)
01316    {
01317       // read is not available any more
01318       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.disable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
01319    }
01320 
01321    if ((res <= 0) && (m_iRcvTimeOut >= 0))
01322       throw CUDTException(6, 2, 0);
01323 
01324    return res;
01325 }
01326 
01327 int64_t CUDT::sendfile(fstream& ifs, int64_t& offset, const int64_t& size, const int& block)
01328 {
01329    if (UDT_DGRAM == m_iSockType)
01330       throw CUDTException(5, 10, 0);
01331 
01332    if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
01333       throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01334    else if (!m_bConnected)
01335       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01336 
01337    if (size <= 0)
01338       return 0;
01339 
01340    CGuard sendguard(m_SendLock);
01341 
01342    int64_t tosend = size;
01343    int unitsize;
01344 
01345    // positioning...
01346    try
01347    {
01348       ifs.seekg((streamoff)offset);
01349    }
01350    catch (...)
01351    {
01352       throw CUDTException(4, 1);
01353    }
01354 
01355    // sending block by block
01356    while (tosend > 0)
01357    {
01358       if (ifs.fail())
01359          throw CUDTException(4, 4);
01360 
01361       if (ifs.eof())
01362          break;
01363 
01364       unitsize = int((tosend >= block) ? block : tosend);
01365 
01366       #ifndef WIN32
01367          pthread_mutex_lock(&m_SendBlockLock);
01368          while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) && m_bPeerHealth)
01369             pthread_cond_wait(&m_SendBlockCond, &m_SendBlockLock);
01370          pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_SendBlockLock);
01371       #else
01372          while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) && m_bPeerHealth)
01373             WaitForSingleObject(m_SendBlockCond, INFINITE);
01374       #endif
01375 
01376       if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
01377          throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01378       else if (!m_bConnected)
01379          throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01380       else if (!m_bPeerHealth)
01381       {
01382          // reset peer health status, once this error returns, the app should handle the situation at the peer side
01383          m_bPeerHealth = true;
01384          throw CUDTException(7);
01385       }
01386 
01387       // record total time used for sending
01388       if (0 == m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize())
01389          m_llSndDurationCounter = CTimer::getTime();
01390 
01391       int64_t sentsize = m_pSndBuffer->addBufferFromFile(ifs, unitsize);
01392 
01393       if (sentsize > 0)
01394       {
01395          tosend -= sentsize;
01396          offset += sentsize;
01397       }
01398 
01399       // insert this socket to snd list if it is not on the list yet
01400       m_pSndQueue->m_pSndUList->update(this, false);
01401    }
01402 
01403    if (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize())
01404    {
01405       // write is not available any more
01406       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.disable_write(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
01407    }
01408 
01409    return size - tosend;
01410 }
01411 
01412 int64_t CUDT::recvfile(fstream& ofs, int64_t& offset, const int64_t& size, const int& block)
01413 {
01414    if (UDT_DGRAM == m_iSockType)
01415       throw CUDTException(5, 10, 0);
01416 
01417    if (!m_bConnected)
01418       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01419    else if ((m_bBroken || m_bClosing) && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01420       throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01421 
01422    if (size <= 0)
01423       return 0;
01424 
01425    CGuard recvguard(m_RecvLock);
01426 
01427    int64_t torecv = size;
01428    int unitsize = block;
01429    int recvsize;
01430 
01431    // positioning...
01432    try
01433    {
01434       ofs.seekp((streamoff)offset);
01435    }
01436    catch (...)
01437    {
01438       throw CUDTException(4, 3);
01439    }
01440 
01441    // receiving... "recvfile" is always blocking
01442    while (torecv > 0)
01443    {
01444       if (ofs.fail())
01445       {
01446          // send the sender a signal so it will not be blocked forever
01447          int32_t err_code = CUDTException::EFILE;
01448          sendCtrl(8, &err_code);
01449 
01450          throw CUDTException(4, 4);
01451       }
01452 
01453       #ifndef WIN32
01454          pthread_mutex_lock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01455          while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01456             pthread_cond_wait(&m_RecvDataCond, &m_RecvDataLock);
01457          pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01458       #else
01459          while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01460             WaitForSingleObject(m_RecvDataCond, INFINITE);
01461       #endif
01462 
01463       if (!m_bConnected)
01464          throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01465       else if ((m_bBroken || m_bClosing) && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01466          throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01467 
01468       unitsize = int((torecv >= block) ? block : torecv);
01469       recvsize = m_pRcvBuffer->readBufferToFile(ofs, unitsize);
01470 
01471       if (recvsize > 0)
01472       {
01473          torecv -= recvsize;
01474          offset += recvsize;
01475       }
01476    }
01477 
01478    if (m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize() <= 0)
01479    {
01480       // read is not available any more
01481       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.disable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
01482    }
01483 
01484    return size - torecv;
01485 }
01486 
01487 void CUDT::sample(CPerfMon* perf, bool clear)
01488 {
01489    if (!m_bConnected)
01490       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01491    if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
01492       throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01493 
01494    uint64_t currtime = CTimer::getTime();
01495    perf->msTimeStamp = (currtime - m_StartTime) / 1000;
01496 
01497    perf->pktSent = m_llTraceSent;
01498    perf->pktRecv = m_llTraceRecv;
01499    perf->pktSndLoss = m_iTraceSndLoss;
01500    perf->pktRcvLoss = m_iTraceRcvLoss;
01501    perf->pktRetrans = m_iTraceRetrans;
01502    perf->pktSentACK = m_iSentACK;
01503    perf->pktRecvACK = m_iRecvACK;
01504    perf->pktSentNAK = m_iSentNAK;
01505    perf->pktRecvNAK = m_iRecvNAK;
01506    perf->usSndDuration = m_llSndDuration;
01507 
01508    perf->pktSentTotal = m_llSentTotal;
01509    perf->pktRecvTotal = m_llRecvTotal;
01510    perf->pktSndLossTotal = m_iSndLossTotal;
01511    perf->pktRcvLossTotal = m_iRcvLossTotal;
01512    perf->pktRetransTotal = m_iRetransTotal;
01513    perf->pktSentACKTotal = m_iSentACKTotal;
01514    perf->pktRecvACKTotal = m_iRecvACKTotal;
01515    perf->pktSentNAKTotal = m_iSentNAKTotal;
01516    perf->pktRecvNAKTotal = m_iRecvNAKTotal;
01517    perf->usSndDurationTotal = m_llSndDurationTotal;
01518 
01519    double interval = double(currtime - m_LastSampleTime);
01520 
01521    perf->mbpsSendRate = double(m_llTraceSent) * m_iPayloadSize * 8.0 / interval;
01522    perf->mbpsRecvRate = double(m_llTraceRecv) * m_iPayloadSize * 8.0 / interval;
01523 
01524    perf->usPktSndPeriod = m_ullInterval / double(m_ullCPUFrequency);
01525    perf->pktFlowWindow = m_iFlowWindowSize;
01526    perf->pktCongestionWindow = (int)m_dCongestionWindow;
01527    perf->pktFlightSize = CSeqNo::seqlen(const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck), CSeqNo::incseq(m_iSndCurrSeqNo)) - 1;
01528    perf->msRTT = m_iRTT/1000.0;
01529    perf->mbpsBandwidth = m_iBandwidth * m_iPayloadSize * 8.0 / 1000000.0;
01530 
01531    #ifndef WIN32
01532       if (0 == pthread_mutex_trylock(&m_ConnectionLock))
01533    #else
01534       if (WAIT_OBJECT_0 == WaitForSingleObject(m_ConnectionLock, 0))
01535    #endif
01536    {
01537       perf->byteAvailSndBuf = (NULL == m_pSndBuffer) ? 0 : (m_iSndBufSize - m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) * m_iMSS;
01538       perf->byteAvailRcvBuf = (NULL == m_pRcvBuffer) ? 0 : m_pRcvBuffer->getAvailBufSize() * m_iMSS;
01539 
01540       #ifndef WIN32
01541          pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_ConnectionLock);
01542       #else
01543          ReleaseMutex(m_ConnectionLock);
01544       #endif
01545    }
01546    else
01547    {
01548       perf->byteAvailSndBuf = 0;
01549       perf->byteAvailRcvBuf = 0;
01550    }
01551 
01552    if (clear)
01553    {
01554       m_llTraceSent = m_llTraceRecv = m_iTraceSndLoss = m_iTraceRcvLoss = m_iTraceRetrans = m_iSentACK = m_iRecvACK = m_iSentNAK = m_iRecvNAK = 0;
01555       m_llSndDuration = 0;
01556       m_LastSampleTime = currtime;
01557    }
01558 }
01559 
01560 void CUDT::initSynch()
01561 {
01562    #ifndef WIN32
01563       pthread_mutex_init(&m_SendBlockLock, NULL);
01564       pthread_cond_init(&m_SendBlockCond, NULL);
01565       pthread_mutex_init(&m_RecvDataLock, NULL);
01566       pthread_cond_init(&m_RecvDataCond, NULL);
01567       pthread_mutex_init(&m_SendLock, NULL);
01568       pthread_mutex_init(&m_RecvLock, NULL);
01569       pthread_mutex_init(&m_AckLock, NULL);
01570       pthread_mutex_init(&m_ConnectionLock, NULL);
01571    #else
01572       m_SendBlockLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
01573       m_SendBlockCond = CreateEvent(NULL, false, false, NULL);
01574       m_RecvDataLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
01575       m_RecvDataCond = CreateEvent(NULL, false, false, NULL);
01576       m_SendLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
01577       m_RecvLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
01578       m_AckLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
01579       m_ConnectionLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
01580    #endif
01581 }
01582 
01583 void CUDT::destroySynch()
01584 {
01585    #ifndef WIN32
01586       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_SendBlockLock);
01587       pthread_cond_destroy(&m_SendBlockCond);
01588       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_RecvDataLock);
01589       pthread_cond_destroy(&m_RecvDataCond);
01590       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_SendLock);
01591       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_RecvLock);
01592       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_AckLock);
01593       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_ConnectionLock);
01594    #else
01595       CloseHandle(m_SendBlockLock);
01596       CloseHandle(m_SendBlockCond);
01597       CloseHandle(m_RecvDataLock);
01598       CloseHandle(m_RecvDataCond);
01599       CloseHandle(m_SendLock);
01600       CloseHandle(m_RecvLock);
01601       CloseHandle(m_AckLock);
01602       CloseHandle(m_ConnectionLock);
01603    #endif
01604 }
01605 
01606 void CUDT::releaseSynch()
01607 {
01608    #ifndef WIN32
01609       // wake up user calls
01610       pthread_mutex_lock(&m_SendBlockLock);
01611       pthread_cond_signal(&m_SendBlockCond);
01612       pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_SendBlockLock);
01613 
01614       pthread_mutex_lock(&m_SendLock);
01615       pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_SendLock);
01616 
01617       pthread_mutex_lock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01618       pthread_cond_signal(&m_RecvDataCond);
01619       pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01620 
01621       pthread_mutex_lock(&m_RecvLock);
01622       pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_RecvLock);
01623    #else
01624       SetEvent(m_SendBlockCond);
01625       WaitForSingleObject(m_SendLock, INFINITE);
01626       ReleaseMutex(m_SendLock);
01627       SetEvent(m_RecvDataCond);
01628       WaitForSingleObject(m_RecvLock, INFINITE);
01629       ReleaseMutex(m_RecvLock);
01630    #endif
01631 }
01632 
01633 void CUDT::sendCtrl(const int& pkttype, void* lparam, void* rparam, const int& size)
01634 {
01635    CPacket ctrlpkt;
01636 
01637    switch (pkttype)
01638    {
01639    case 2: //010 - Acknowledgement
01640       {
01641       int32_t ack;
01642 
01643       // If there is no loss, the ACK is the current largest sequence number plus 1;
01644       // Otherwise it is the smallest sequence number in the receiver loss list.
01645       if (0 == m_pRcvLossList->getLossLength())
01646          ack = CSeqNo::incseq(m_iRcvCurrSeqNo);
01647       else
01648          ack = m_pRcvLossList->getFirstLostSeq();
01649 
01650       if (ack == m_iRcvLastAckAck)
01651          break;
01652 
01653       // send out a lite ACK
01654       // to save time on buffer processing and bandwidth/AS measurement, a lite ACK only feeds back an ACK number
01655       if (4 == size)
01656       {
01657          ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, NULL, &ack, size);
01658          ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01659          m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01660 
01661          break;
01662       }
01663 
01664       uint64_t currtime;
01665       CTimer::rdtsc(currtime);
01666 
01667       // There are new received packets to acknowledge, update related information.
01668       if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(ack, m_iRcvLastAck) > 0)
01669       {
01670          int acksize = CSeqNo::seqoff(m_iRcvLastAck, ack);
01671 
01672          m_iRcvLastAck = ack;
01673 
01674          m_pRcvBuffer->ackData(acksize);
01675 
01676          // signal a waiting "recv" call if there is any data available
01677          #ifndef WIN32
01678             pthread_mutex_lock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01679             if (m_bSynRecving)
01680                pthread_cond_signal(&m_RecvDataCond);
01681             pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01682          #else
01683             if (m_bSynRecving)
01684                SetEvent(m_RecvDataCond);
01685          #endif
01686 
01687          // acknowledge any waiting epolls to read
01688          s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.enable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
01689       }
01690       else if (ack == m_iRcvLastAck)
01691       {
01692          if ((currtime - m_ullLastAckTime) < ((m_iRTT + 4 * m_iRTTVar) * m_ullCPUFrequency))
01693             break;
01694       }
01695       else
01696          break;
01697 
01698       // Send out the ACK only if has not been received by the sender before
01699       if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(m_iRcvLastAck, m_iRcvLastAckAck) > 0)
01700       {
01701          int32_t data[6];
01702 
01703          m_iAckSeqNo = CAckNo::incack(m_iAckSeqNo);
01704          data[0] = m_iRcvLastAck;
01705          data[1] = m_iRTT;
01706          data[2] = m_iRTTVar;
01707          data[3] = m_pRcvBuffer->getAvailBufSize();
01708          // a minimum flow window of 2 is used, even if buffer is full, to break potential deadlock
01709          if (data[3] < 2)
01710             data[3] = 2;
01711 
01712          if (currtime - m_ullLastAckTime > m_ullSYNInt)
01713          {
01714             data[4] = m_pRcvTimeWindow->getPktRcvSpeed();
01715             data[5] = m_pRcvTimeWindow->getBandwidth();
01716             ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, &m_iAckSeqNo, data, 24);
01717 
01718             CTimer::rdtsc(m_ullLastAckTime);
01719          }
01720          else
01721          {
01722             ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, &m_iAckSeqNo, data, 16);
01723          }
01724 
01725          ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01726          m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01727 
01728          m_pACKWindow->store(m_iAckSeqNo, m_iRcvLastAck);
01729 
01730          ++ m_iSentACK;
01731          ++ m_iSentACKTotal;
01732       }
01733 
01734       break;
01735       }
01736 
01737    case 6: //110 - Acknowledgement of Acknowledgement
01738       ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, lparam);
01739       ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01740       m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01741 
01742       break;
01743 
01744    case 3: //011 - Loss Report
01745       {
01746       if (NULL != rparam)
01747       {
01748          if (1 == size)
01749          {
01750             // only 1 loss packet
01751             ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, NULL, (int32_t *)rparam + 1, 4);
01752          }
01753          else
01754          {
01755             // more than 1 loss packets
01756             ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, NULL, rparam, 8);
01757          }
01758 
01759          ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01760          m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01761 
01762          ++ m_iSentNAK;
01763          ++ m_iSentNAKTotal;
01764       }
01765       else if (m_pRcvLossList->getLossLength() > 0)
01766       {
01767          // this is periodically NAK report; make sure NAK cannot be sent back too often
01768 
01769          // read loss list from the local receiver loss list
01770          int32_t* data = new int32_t[m_iPayloadSize / 4];
01771          int losslen;
01772          m_pRcvLossList->getLossArray(data, losslen, m_iPayloadSize / 4);
01773 
01774          if (0 < losslen)
01775          {
01776             ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, NULL, data, losslen * 4);
01777             ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01778             m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01779 
01780             ++ m_iSentNAK;
01781             ++ m_iSentNAKTotal;
01782          }
01783 
01784          delete [] data;
01785       }
01786 
01787       // update next NAK time, which should wait enough time for the retansmission, but not too long
01788       m_ullNAKInt = (m_iRTT + 4 * m_iRTTVar) * m_ullCPUFrequency;
01789       int rcv_speed = m_pRcvTimeWindow->getPktRcvSpeed();
01790       if (rcv_speed > 0)
01791          m_ullNAKInt += (m_pRcvLossList->getLossLength() * 1000000ULL / rcv_speed) * m_ullCPUFrequency;
01792       if (m_ullNAKInt < m_ullMinNakInt)
01793          m_ullNAKInt = m_ullMinNakInt;
01794 
01795       break;
01796       }
01797 
01798    case 4: //100 - Congestion Warning
01799       ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype);
01800       ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01801       m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01802 
01803       CTimer::rdtsc(m_ullLastWarningTime);
01804 
01805       break;
01806 
01807    case 1: //001 - Keep-alive
01808       ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype);
01809       ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01810       m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01811  
01812       break;
01813 
01814    case 0: //000 - Handshake
01815       ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, NULL, rparam, sizeof(CHandShake));
01816       ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01817       m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01818 
01819       break;
01820 
01821    case 5: //101 - Shutdown
01822       ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype);
01823       ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01824       m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01825 
01826       break;
01827 
01828    case 7: //111 - Msg drop request
01829       ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, lparam, rparam, 8);
01830       ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01831       m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01832 
01833       break;
01834 
01835    case 8: //1000 - acknowledge the peer side a special error
01836       ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, lparam);
01837       ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01838       m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01839 
01840       break;
01841 
01842    case 32767: //0x7FFF - Resevered for future use
01843       break;
01844 
01845    default:
01846       break;
01847    }
01848 }
01849 
01850 void CUDT::processCtrl(CPacket& ctrlpkt)
01851 {
01852    // Just heard from the peer, reset the expiration count.
01853    m_iEXPCount = 1;
01854    m_llLastRspTime = CTimer::getTime();
01855 
01856    if ((CSeqNo::incseq(m_iSndCurrSeqNo) == m_iSndLastAck) || (2 == ctrlpkt.getType()) || (3 == ctrlpkt.getType()))
01857    {
01858       uint64_t currtime;
01859       CTimer::rdtsc(currtime);
01860       if (!m_pCC->m_bUserDefinedRTO)
01861          m_ullNextEXPTime = currtime + m_ullEXPInt;
01862       else
01863          m_ullNextEXPTime = currtime + m_pCC->m_iRTO * m_ullCPUFrequency;
01864    }
01865 
01866    switch (ctrlpkt.getType())
01867    {
01868    case 2: //010 - Acknowledgement
01869       {
01870       int32_t ack;
01871 
01872       // process a lite ACK
01873       if (4 == ctrlpkt.getLength())
01874       {
01875          ack = *(int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData;
01876          if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(ack, const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck)) >= 0)
01877          {
01878             m_iFlowWindowSize -= CSeqNo::seqoff(const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck), ack);
01879             m_iSndLastAck = ack;
01880          }
01881 
01882          break;
01883       }
01884 
01885        // read ACK seq. no.
01886       ack = ctrlpkt.getAckSeqNo();
01887 
01888       // send ACK acknowledgement
01889       // number of ACK2 can be much less than number of ACK
01890       uint64_t currtime = CTimer::getTime();
01891       if ((currtime - m_ullSndLastAck2Time > (uint64_t)m_iSYNInterval) || (ack == m_iSndLastAck2))
01892       {
01893          sendCtrl(6, &ack);
01894          m_iSndLastAck2 = ack;
01895          m_ullSndLastAck2Time = currtime;
01896       }
01897 
01898       // Got data ACK
01899       ack = *(int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData;
01900 
01901       // check the validation of the ack
01902       if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(ack, CSeqNo::incseq(m_iSndCurrSeqNo)) > 0)
01903       {
01904          //this should not happen: attack or bug
01905          m_bBroken = true;
01906          m_iBrokenCounter = 0;
01907          break;
01908       }
01909 
01910       if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(ack, const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck)) >= 0)
01911       {
01912          // Update Flow Window Size, must update before and together with m_iSndLastAck
01913          m_iFlowWindowSize = *((int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 3);
01914          m_iSndLastAck = ack;
01915       }
01916 
01917       // protect packet retransmission
01918       CGuard::enterCS(m_AckLock);
01919 
01920       int offset = CSeqNo::seqoff((int32_t&)m_iSndLastDataAck, ack);
01921       if (offset <= 0)
01922       {
01923          // discard it if it is a repeated ACK
01924          CGuard::leaveCS(m_AckLock);
01925          break;
01926       }
01927 
01928       // acknowledge the sending buffer
01929       m_pSndBuffer->ackData(offset);
01930 
01931       // record total time used for sending
01932       m_llSndDuration += currtime - m_llSndDurationCounter;
01933       m_llSndDurationTotal += currtime - m_llSndDurationCounter;
01934       m_llSndDurationCounter = currtime;
01935 
01936       // update sending variables
01937       m_iSndLastDataAck = ack;
01938       m_pSndLossList->remove(CSeqNo::decseq((int32_t&)m_iSndLastDataAck));
01939 
01940       CGuard::leaveCS(m_AckLock);
01941 
01942       #ifndef WIN32
01943          pthread_mutex_lock(&m_SendBlockLock);
01944          if (m_bSynSending)
01945             pthread_cond_signal(&m_SendBlockCond);
01946          pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_SendBlockLock);
01947       #else
01948          if (m_bSynSending)
01949             SetEvent(m_SendBlockCond);
01950       #endif
01951 
01952       // acknowledde any waiting epolls to write
01953       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.enable_write(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
01954 
01955       // insert this socket to snd list if it is not on the list yet
01956       m_pSndQueue->m_pSndUList->update(this, false);
01957 
01958       // Update RTT
01959       //m_iRTT = *((int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 1);
01960       //m_iRTTVar = *((int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 2);
01961       int rtt = *((int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 1);
01962       m_iRTTVar = (m_iRTTVar * 3 + abs(rtt - m_iRTT)) >> 2;
01963       m_iRTT = (m_iRTT * 7 + rtt) >> 3;
01964 
01965       m_pCC->setRTT(m_iRTT);
01966 
01967       m_ullEXPInt = (m_iRTT + 4 * m_iRTTVar) * m_ullCPUFrequency + m_ullSYNInt;
01968       if (m_ullEXPInt < m_ullMinExpInt)
01969          m_ullEXPInt = m_ullMinExpInt;
01970 
01971       if (ctrlpkt.getLength() > 16)
01972       {
01973          // Update Estimated Bandwidth and packet delivery rate
01974          if (*((int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 4) > 0)
01975             m_iDeliveryRate = (m_iDeliveryRate * 7 + *((int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 4)) >> 3;
01976 
01977          if (*((int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 5) > 0)
01978             m_iBandwidth = (m_iBandwidth * 7 + *((int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 5)) >> 3;
01979 
01980          m_pCC->setRcvRate(m_iDeliveryRate);
01981          m_pCC->setBandwidth(m_iBandwidth);
01982       }
01983 
01984       m_pCC->onACK(ack);
01985       // update CC parameters
01986       m_ullInterval = (uint64_t)(m_pCC->m_dPktSndPeriod * m_ullCPUFrequency);
01987       m_dCongestionWindow = m_pCC->m_dCWndSize;
01988 
01989       ++ m_iRecvACK;
01990       ++ m_iRecvACKTotal;
01991 
01992       break;
01993       }
01994 
01995    case 6: //110 - Acknowledgement of Acknowledgement
01996       {
01997       int32_t ack;
01998       int rtt = -1;
01999 
02000       // update RTT
02001       rtt = m_pACKWindow->acknowledge(ctrlpkt.getAckSeqNo(), ack);
02002       if (rtt <= 0)
02003          break;
02004 
02005       //if increasing delay detected...
02006       //   sendCtrl(4);
02007 
02008       // RTT EWMA
02009       m_iRTTVar = (m_iRTTVar * 3 + abs(rtt - m_iRTT)) >> 2;
02010       m_iRTT = (m_iRTT * 7 + rtt) >> 3;
02011 
02012       m_pCC->setRTT(m_iRTT);
02013 
02014       m_ullEXPInt = (m_iRTT + 4 * m_iRTTVar) * m_ullCPUFrequency + m_ullSYNInt;
02015       if (m_ullEXPInt < m_ullMinExpInt)
02016          m_ullEXPInt = m_ullMinExpInt;
02017 
02018       // update last ACK that has been received by the sender
02019       if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(ack, m_iRcvLastAckAck) > 0)
02020          m_iRcvLastAckAck = ack;
02021 
02022       break;
02023       }
02024 
02025    case 3: //011 - Loss Report
02026       {
02027       int32_t* losslist = (int32_t *)(ctrlpkt.m_pcData);
02028 
02029       m_pCC->onLoss(losslist, ctrlpkt.getLength() / 4);
02030       // update CC parameters
02031       m_ullInterval = (uint64_t)(m_pCC->m_dPktSndPeriod * m_ullCPUFrequency);
02032       m_dCongestionWindow = m_pCC->m_dCWndSize;
02033 
02034       bool secure = true;
02035 
02036       // decode loss list message and insert loss into the sender loss list
02037       for (int i = 0, n = (int)(ctrlpkt.getLength() / 4); i < n; ++ i)
02038       {
02039          if (0 != (losslist[i] & 0x80000000))
02040          {
02041             if ((CSeqNo::seqcmp(losslist[i] & 0x7FFFFFFF, losslist[i + 1]) > 0) || (CSeqNo::seqcmp(losslist[i + 1], const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndCurrSeqNo)) > 0))
02042             {
02043                // seq_a must not be greater than seq_b; seq_b must not be greater than the most recent sent seq
02044                secure = false;
02045                break;
02046             }
02047 
02048             int num = 0;
02049             if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(losslist[i] & 0x7FFFFFFF, const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck)) >= 0)
02050                num = m_pSndLossList->insert(losslist[i] & 0x7FFFFFFF, losslist[i + 1]);
02051             else if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(losslist[i + 1], const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck)) >= 0)
02052                num = m_pSndLossList->insert(const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck), losslist[i + 1]);
02053 
02054             m_iTraceSndLoss += num;
02055             m_iSndLossTotal += num;
02056 
02057             ++ i;
02058          }
02059          else if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(losslist[i], const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck)) >= 0)
02060          {
02061             if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(losslist[i], const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndCurrSeqNo)) > 0)
02062             {
02063                //seq_a must not be greater than the most recent sent seq
02064                secure = false;
02065                break;
02066             }
02067 
02068             int num = m_pSndLossList->insert(losslist[i], losslist[i]);
02069 
02070             m_iTraceSndLoss += num;
02071             m_iSndLossTotal += num;
02072          }
02073       }
02074 
02075       if (!secure)
02076       {
02077          //this should not happen: attack or bug
02078          m_bBroken = true;
02079          m_iBrokenCounter = 0;
02080          break;
02081       }
02082 
02083       // the lost packet (retransmission) should be sent out immediately
02084       m_pSndQueue->m_pSndUList->update(this);
02085 
02086       ++ m_iRecvNAK;
02087       ++ m_iRecvNAKTotal;
02088 
02089       break;
02090       }
02091 
02092    case 4: //100 - Delay Warning
02093       // One way packet delay is increasing, so decrease the sending rate
02094       m_ullInterval = (uint64_t)ceil(m_ullInterval * 1.125);
02095       m_iLastDecSeq = m_iSndCurrSeqNo;
02096 
02097       break;
02098 
02099    case 1: //001 - Keep-alive
02100       // The only purpose of keep-alive packet is to tell that the peer is still alive
02101       // nothing needs to be done.
02102 
02103       break;
02104 
02105    case 0: //000 - Handshake
02106       if ((((CHandShake*)(ctrlpkt.m_pcData))->m_iReqType > 0) || (m_bRendezvous && (((CHandShake*)(ctrlpkt.m_pcData))->m_iReqType != -2)))
02107       {
02108          // The peer side has not received the handshake message, so it keeps querying
02109          // resend the handshake packet
02110 
02111          CHandShake initdata;
02112          initdata.m_iISN = m_iISN;
02113          initdata.m_iMSS = m_iMSS;
02114          initdata.m_iFlightFlagSize = m_iFlightFlagSize;
02115          initdata.m_iReqType = (!m_bRendezvous) ? -1 : -2;
02116          initdata.m_iID = m_SocketID;
02117 
02118          char buffer[1500];
02119          int size = 1500;
02120          initdata.serialize(buffer, size);
02121          sendCtrl(0, NULL, buffer, size);
02122       }
02123 
02124       break;
02125 
02126    case 5: //101 - Shutdown
02127       m_bShutdown = true;
02128       m_bClosing = true;
02129       m_bBroken = true;
02130       m_iBrokenCounter = 60;
02131 
02132       // Signal the sender and recver if they are waiting for data.
02133       releaseSynch();
02134 
02135       CTimer::triggerEvent();
02136 
02137       break;
02138 
02139    case 7: //111 - Msg drop request
02140       m_pRcvBuffer->dropMsg(ctrlpkt.getMsgSeq());
02141       m_pRcvLossList->remove(*(int32_t*)ctrlpkt.m_pcData, *(int32_t*)(ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 4));
02142 
02143       // move forward with current recv seq no.
02144       if ((CSeqNo::seqcmp(*(int32_t*)ctrlpkt.m_pcData, CSeqNo::incseq(m_iRcvCurrSeqNo)) <= 0)
02145          && (CSeqNo::seqcmp(*(int32_t*)(ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 4), m_iRcvCurrSeqNo) > 0))
02146       {
02147          m_iRcvCurrSeqNo = *(int32_t*)(ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 4);
02148       }
02149 
02150       break;
02151 
02152    case 8: // 1000 - An error has happened to the peer side
02153       //int err_type = packet.getAddInfo();
02154 
02155       // currently only this error is signalled from the peer side
02156       // if recvfile() failes (e.g., due to disk fail), blcoked sendfile/send should return immediately
02157       // giving the app a chance to fix the issue
02158 
02159       m_bPeerHealth = false;
02160 
02161       break;
02162 
02163    case 32767: //0x7FFF - reserved and user defined messages
02164       m_pCC->processCustomMsg(&ctrlpkt);
02165       // update CC parameters
02166       m_ullInterval = (uint64_t)(m_pCC->m_dPktSndPeriod * m_ullCPUFrequency);
02167       m_dCongestionWindow = m_pCC->m_dCWndSize;
02168 
02169       break;
02170 
02171    default:
02172       break;
02173    }
02174 }
02175 
02176 int CUDT::packData(CPacket& packet, uint64_t& ts)
02177 {
02178    int payload = 0;
02179    bool probe = false;
02180 
02181    uint64_t entertime;
02182    CTimer::rdtsc(entertime);
02183 
02184    if ((0 != m_ullTargetTime) && (entertime > m_ullTargetTime))
02185       m_ullTimeDiff += entertime - m_ullTargetTime;
02186 
02187    // Loss retransmission always has higher priority.
02188    if ((packet.m_iSeqNo = m_pSndLossList->getLostSeq()) >= 0)
02189    {
02190       // protect m_iSndLastDataAck from updating by ACK processing
02191       CGuard ackguard(m_AckLock);
02192 
02193       int offset = CSeqNo::seqoff((int32_t&)m_iSndLastDataAck, packet.m_iSeqNo);
02194       if (offset < 0)
02195          return 0;
02196 
02197       int msglen;
02198 
02199       payload = m_pSndBuffer->readData(&(packet.m_pcData), offset, packet.m_iMsgNo, msglen);
02200 
02201       if (-1 == payload)
02202       {
02203          int32_t seqpair[2];
02204          seqpair[0] = packet.m_iSeqNo;
02205          seqpair[1] = CSeqNo::incseq(seqpair[0], msglen);
02206          sendCtrl(7, &packet.m_iMsgNo, seqpair, 8);
02207 
02208          // only one msg drop request is necessary
02209          m_pSndLossList->remove(seqpair[1]);
02210 
02211          // skip all dropped packets
02212          if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndCurrSeqNo), CSeqNo::incseq(seqpair[1])) < 0)
02213              m_iSndCurrSeqNo = CSeqNo::incseq(seqpair[1]);
02214 
02215          return 0;
02216       }
02217       else if (0 == payload)
02218          return 0;
02219 
02220       ++ m_iTraceRetrans;
02221       ++ m_iRetransTotal;
02222    }
02223    else
02224    {
02225       // If no loss, pack a new packet.
02226 
02227       // check congestion/flow window limit
02228       int cwnd = (m_iFlowWindowSize < (int)m_dCongestionWindow) ? m_iFlowWindowSize : (int)m_dCongestionWindow;
02229       if (cwnd >= CSeqNo::seqlen(const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck), CSeqNo::incseq(m_iSndCurrSeqNo)))
02230       {
02231          if (0 != (payload = m_pSndBuffer->readData(&(packet.m_pcData), packet.m_iMsgNo)))
02232          {
02233             m_iSndCurrSeqNo = CSeqNo::incseq(m_iSndCurrSeqNo);
02234             m_pCC->setSndCurrSeqNo((int32_t&)m_iSndCurrSeqNo);
02235 
02236             packet.m_iSeqNo = m_iSndCurrSeqNo;
02237 
02238             // every 16 (0xF) packets, a packet pair is sent
02239             if (0 == (packet.m_iSeqNo & 0xF))
02240                probe = true;
02241          }
02242          else
02243          {
02244             m_ullTargetTime = 0;
02245             m_ullTimeDiff = 0;
02246             ts = 0;
02247             return 0;
02248          }
02249       }
02250       else
02251       {
02252          m_ullTargetTime = 0;
02253          m_ullTimeDiff = 0;
02254          ts = 0;
02255          return 0;
02256       }
02257    }
02258 
02259    packet.m_iTimeStamp = int(CTimer::getTime() - m_StartTime);
02260    packet.m_iID = m_PeerID;
02261    packet.setLength(payload);
02262 
02263    m_pCC->onPktSent(&packet);
02264    //m_pSndTimeWindow->onPktSent(packet.m_iTimeStamp);
02265 
02266    ++ m_llTraceSent;
02267    ++ m_llSentTotal;
02268 
02269    if (probe)
02270    {
02271       // sends out probing packet pair
02272       ts = entertime;
02273       probe = false;
02274    }
02275    else
02276    {
02277       #ifndef NO_BUSY_WAITING
02278          ts = entertime + m_ullInterval;
02279       #else
02280          if (m_ullTimeDiff >= m_ullInterval)
02281          {
02282             ts = entertime;
02283             m_ullTimeDiff -= m_ullInterval;
02284          }
02285          else
02286          {
02287             ts = entertime + m_ullInterval - m_ullTimeDiff;
02288             m_ullTimeDiff = 0;
02289          }
02290       #endif
02291    }
02292 
02293    m_ullTargetTime = ts;
02294 
02295    return payload;
02296 }
02297 
02298 int CUDT::processData(CUnit* unit)
02299 {
02300    CPacket& packet = unit->m_Packet;
02301 
02302    // Just heard from the peer, reset the expiration count.
02303    m_iEXPCount = 1;
02304    m_llLastRspTime = CTimer::getTime();
02305 
02306    if (CSeqNo::incseq(m_iSndCurrSeqNo) == m_iSndLastAck)
02307    {
02308       uint64_t currtime;
02309       CTimer::rdtsc(currtime);
02310       if (!m_pCC->m_bUserDefinedRTO)
02311          m_ullNextEXPTime = currtime + m_ullEXPInt;
02312       else
02313          m_ullNextEXPTime = currtime + m_pCC->m_iRTO * m_ullCPUFrequency;
02314    }
02315 
02316    m_pCC->onPktReceived(&packet);
02317 
02318    ++ m_iPktCount;
02319 
02320    // update time information
02321    m_pRcvTimeWindow->onPktArrival();
02322 
02323    // check if it is probing packet pair
02324    if (0 == (packet.m_iSeqNo & 0xF))
02325       m_pRcvTimeWindow->probe1Arrival();
02326    else if (1 == (packet.m_iSeqNo & 0xF))
02327       m_pRcvTimeWindow->probe2Arrival();
02328 
02329    ++ m_llTraceRecv;
02330    ++ m_llRecvTotal;
02331 
02332    int32_t offset = CSeqNo::seqoff(m_iRcvLastAck, packet.m_iSeqNo);
02333    if ((offset < 0) || (offset >= m_pRcvBuffer->getAvailBufSize()))
02334       return -1;
02335 
02336    if (m_pRcvBuffer->addData(unit, offset) < 0)
02337       return -1;
02338 
02339    // Loss detection.
02340    if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(packet.m_iSeqNo, CSeqNo::incseq(m_iRcvCurrSeqNo)) > 0)
02341    {
02342       // If loss found, insert them to the receiver loss list
02343       m_pRcvLossList->insert(CSeqNo::incseq(m_iRcvCurrSeqNo), CSeqNo::decseq(packet.m_iSeqNo));
02344 
02345       // pack loss list for NAK
02346       int32_t lossdata[2];
02347       lossdata[0] = CSeqNo::incseq(m_iRcvCurrSeqNo) | 0x80000000;
02348       lossdata[1] = CSeqNo::decseq(packet.m_iSeqNo);
02349 
02350       // Generate loss report immediately.
02351       sendCtrl(3, NULL, lossdata, (CSeqNo::incseq(m_iRcvCurrSeqNo) == CSeqNo::decseq(packet.m_iSeqNo)) ? 1 : 2);
02352 
02353       int loss = CSeqNo::seqlen(m_iRcvCurrSeqNo, packet.m_iSeqNo) - 2;
02354       m_iTraceRcvLoss += loss;
02355       m_iRcvLossTotal += loss;
02356    }
02357 
02358    // This is not a regular fixed size packet...   
02359    //an irregular sized packet usually indicates the end of a message, so send an ACK immediately   
02360    if (packet.getLength() != m_iPayloadSize)   
02361       CTimer::rdtsc(m_ullNextACKTime); 
02362 
02363    // Update the current largest sequence number that has been received.
02364    // Or it is a retransmitted packet, remove it from receiver loss list.
02365    if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(packet.m_iSeqNo, m_iRcvCurrSeqNo) > 0)
02366       m_iRcvCurrSeqNo = packet.m_iSeqNo;
02367    else
02368       m_pRcvLossList->remove(packet.m_iSeqNo);
02369 
02370    return 0;
02371 }
02372 
02373 int CUDT::listen(sockaddr* addr, CPacket& packet)
02374 {
02375    if (m_bClosing)
02376       return 1002;
02377 
02378    if (packet.getLength() != CHandShake::m_iContentSize)
02379       return 1004;
02380
