02381    CHandShake hs;
02382    hs.deserialize(packet.m_pcData, packet.getLength());
02383 
02384    // SYN cookie
02385    char clienthost[NI_MAXHOST];
02386    char clientport[NI_MAXSERV];
02387    getnameinfo(addr, (AF_INET == m_iVersion) ? sizeof(sockaddr_in) : sizeof(sockaddr_in6), clienthost, sizeof(clienthost), clientport, sizeof(clientport), NI_NUMERICHOST|NI_NUMERICSERV);
02388    int64_t timestamp = (CTimer::getTime() - m_StartTime) / 60000000; // secret changes every one minute
02389    char cookiestr[1024];
02390    sprintf(cookiestr, "%s:%s:%lld", clienthost, clientport, (long long int)timestamp);
02391    unsigned char cookie[16];
02392    CMD5::compute(cookiestr, cookie);
02393 
02394    if (1 == hs.m_iReqType)
02395    {
02396       hs.m_iCookie = *(int*)cookie;
02397       packet.m_iID = hs.m_iID;
02398       int size = packet.getLength();
02399       hs.serialize(packet.m_pcData, size);
02400       m_pSndQueue->sendto(addr, packet);
02401       return 0;
02402    }
02403    else
02404    {
02405       if (hs.m_iCookie != *(int*)cookie)
02406       {
02407          timestamp --;
02408          sprintf(cookiestr, "%s:%s:%lld", clienthost, clientport, (long long int)timestamp);
02409          CMD5::compute(cookiestr, cookie);
02410 
02411          if (hs.m_iCookie != *(int*)cookie)
02412             return -1;
02413       }
02414    }
02415 
02416    int32_t id = hs.m_iID;
02417 
02418    // When a peer side connects in...
02419    if ((1 == packet.getFlag()) && (0 == packet.getType()))
02420    {
02421       if ((hs.m_iVersion != m_iVersion) || (hs.m_iType != m_iSockType))
02422       {
02423          // mismatch, reject the request
02424          hs.m_iReqType = 1002;
02425          int size = CHandShake::m_iContentSize;
02426          hs.serialize(packet.m_pcData, size);
02427          packet.m_iID = id;
02428          m_pSndQueue->sendto(addr, packet);
02429       }
02430       else
02431       {
02432          int result = s_UDTUnited.newConnection(m_SocketID, addr, &hs);
02433          if (result == -1)
02434             hs.m_iReqType = 1002;
02435 
02436          // send back a response if connection failed or connection already existed
02437          // new connection response should be sent in connect()
02438          if (result != 1)
02439          {
02440             int size = CHandShake::m_iContentSize;
02441             hs.serialize(packet.m_pcData, size);
02442             packet.m_iID = id;
02443             m_pSndQueue->sendto(addr, packet);
02444          }
02445          else
02446          {
02447             // a mew connection has been created, enable epoll for read 
02448             s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.enable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
02449          }
02450       }
02451    }
02452 
02453    return hs.m_iReqType;
02454 }
02455 
02456 void CUDT::checkTimers()
02457 {
02458    // update CC parameters
02459    m_ullInterval = (uint64_t)(m_pCC->m_dPktSndPeriod * m_ullCPUFrequency);
02460    m_dCongestionWindow = m_pCC->m_dCWndSize;
02461    //uint64_t minint = (uint64_t)(m_ullCPUFrequency * m_pSndTimeWindow->getMinPktSndInt() * 0.9);
02462    //if (m_ullInterval < minint)
02463    //   m_ullInterval = minint;
02464 
02465    uint64_t currtime;
02466    CTimer::rdtsc(currtime);
02467 
02468    if ((currtime > m_ullNextACKTime) || ((m_pCC->m_iACKInterval > 0) && (m_pCC->m_iACKInterval <= m_iPktCount)))
02469    {
02470       // ACK timer expired or ACK interval is reached
02471 
02472       sendCtrl(2);
02473       CTimer::rdtsc(currtime);
02474       if (m_pCC->m_iACKPeriod > 0)
02475          m_ullNextACKTime = currtime + m_pCC->m_iACKPeriod * m_ullCPUFrequency;
02476       else
02477          m_ullNextACKTime = currtime + m_ullACKInt;
02478 
02479       m_iPktCount = 0;
02480       m_iLightACKCount = 1;
02481    }
02482    else if (m_iSelfClockInterval * m_iLightACKCount <= m_iPktCount)
02483    {
02484       //send a "light" ACK
02485       sendCtrl(2, NULL, NULL, 4);
02486       ++ m_iLightACKCount;
02487    }
02488 
02489    // we are not sending back repeated NAK anymore and rely on the sender's EXP for retransmission
02490    //if ((m_pRcvLossList->getLossLength() > 0) && (currtime > m_ullNextNAKTime))
02491    //{
02492    //   // NAK timer expired, and there is loss to be reported.
02493    //   sendCtrl(3);
02494    //
02495    //   CTimer::rdtsc(currtime);
02496    //   m_ullNextNAKTime = currtime + m_ullNAKInt;
02497    //}
02498 
02499    if (currtime > m_ullNextEXPTime)
02500    {
02501       // Haven't receive any information from the peer, is it dead?!
02502       // timeout: at least 16 expirations and must be greater than 10 seconds
02503       if ((m_iEXPCount > 16) && (CTimer::getTime() - m_llLastRspTime > 10000000))
02504       {
02505          //
02506          // Connection is broken. 
02507          // UDT does not signal any information about this instead of to stop quietly.
02508          // Apllication will detect this when it calls any UDT methods next time.
02509          //
02510          m_bClosing = true;
02511          m_bBroken = true;
02512          m_iBrokenCounter = 30;
02513 
02514          // update snd U list to remove this socket
02515          m_pSndQueue->m_pSndUList->update(this);
02516 
02517          releaseSynch();
02518 
02519          // a broken socket can be "write" to learn the error
02520          s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.enable_write(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
02521 
02522          CTimer::triggerEvent();
02523 
02524          return;
02525       }
02526 
02527       // sender: Insert all the packets sent after last received acknowledgement into the sender loss list.
02528       // recver: Send out a keep-alive packet
02529       if (m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize() > 0)
02530       {
02531          if ((CSeqNo::incseq(m_iSndCurrSeqNo) != m_iSndLastAck) && (m_pSndLossList->getLossLength() == 0))
02532          {
02533             // resend all unacknowledged packets on timeout, but only if there is no packet in the loss list
02534             int32_t csn = m_iSndCurrSeqNo;
02535             int num = m_pSndLossList->insert(const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck), csn);
02536             m_iTraceSndLoss += num;
02537             m_iSndLossTotal += num;
02538          }
02539 
02540          m_pCC->onTimeout();
02541          // update CC parameters
02542          m_ullInterval = (uint64_t)(m_pCC->m_dPktSndPeriod * m_ullCPUFrequency);
02543          m_dCongestionWindow = m_pCC->m_dCWndSize;
02544 
02545          // immediately restart transmission
02546          m_pSndQueue->m_pSndUList->update(this);
02547       }
02548       else
02549       {
02550          sendCtrl(1);
02551       }
02552 
02553       ++ m_iEXPCount;
02554       m_ullEXPInt = (m_iEXPCount * (m_iRTT + 4 * m_iRTTVar) + m_iSYNInterval) * m_ullCPUFrequency;
02555       if (m_ullEXPInt < m_iEXPCount * m_ullMinExpInt)
02556          m_ullEXPInt = m_iEXPCount * m_ullMinExpInt;
02557       CTimer::rdtsc(m_ullNextEXPTime);
02558       m_ullNextEXPTime += m_ullEXPInt;
02559    }
02560 }
02561 
02562 void CUDT::addEPoll(const int eid)
02563 {
02564    CGuard::enterCS(s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.m_EPollLock);
02565    m_sPollID.insert(eid);
02566    CGuard::leaveCS(s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.m_EPollLock);
02567 
02568    if (!m_bConnected || m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
02569       return;
02570 
02571    if ((UDT_STREAM == m_iSockType) && (m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize() > 0))
02572       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.enable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
02573    else if ((UDT_DGRAM == m_iSockType) && (m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvMsgNum() > 0))
02574       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.enable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
02575 
02576    if (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize())
02577       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.enable_write(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
02578 }
02579 
02580 void CUDT::removeEPoll(const int eid)
02581 {
02582    s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.disable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
02583    s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.disable_write(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
02584 
02585    CGuard::enterCS(s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.m_EPollLock);
02586    m_sPollID.erase(eid);
02587    CGuard::leaveCS(s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.m_EPollLock);
02588 }
